blogPost.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
blogPost.body: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
blogPost.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer
blogPost.author: Charlie Fogarty

localize.description: Storetasker 会在几小时内为您匹配到值得信赖的 Shopify 专家，为您提供大大小小的项目。我们已经采访了超过5000名开发人员，亲自挑选了前5%的开发人员，并从头到尾简化了体验。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪里遇到他们的开发者

localize.description: Storetasker 會在幾小時內爲您匹配到值得信賴的 Shopify 專家，爲您提供大大小小的項目。我們已經採訪了超過5000名開發人員，親自挑選了前5%的開發人員，並從頭到尾簡化了體驗。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪裏遇到他們的開發者

previous.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
previous.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

next.excerpt: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.
next.title: Paraglide - Create automated AI workflows in minutes.

localize.description: Paraglide是第一个机器学习API，让你可以在几分钟内创建、定制和协作自动化AI工作流程。修改你想要的东西，让我们来处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内创建自动化的AI工作流程。

localize.description: Paraglide是第一個機器學習API，讓你可以在幾分鐘內創建、定製和協作自動化AI工作流程。修改你想要的東西，讓我們來處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內創建自動化的AI工作流程。
